comments: Alan Dunn game 1. WE ASKED: Dr. Travis Stork.

clues.clue: Pushing the CC button on your car activates this, perfect for long trips on the open highway
Sometimes before a TV show, you'll see a "CC" indicating this sort of transcription
When you CC a coworker on an e-mail, "CC" is short for this, representing bygone technology
Though legal, this blackjack strategy got Ben Affleck booted from a casino
After a "La Fille du Regiment" performance, Pavarotti received 17 of them
The USA's 10 highest mountain peaks are all found in this state
This range forms a natural barrier between 2 nations, with a third country among its peaks
This mountain rises to some 19,000 feet above the surrounding plains of Tanzania
Featured in "Peer Gynt", the highest range in Scandinavia is the Jotunheimen Mountains of this country
For the first time in 500 years, this volcanic mountain in the Philippines blew its top in 1991
In the expressions sack duty & sack rat, heard in the military, sack means this
As mentioned in the Bible, wearing sackcloth & ashes was a sign of this somber condition
In the 1912 British play "Hindle Wakes", the line "I'll give him the sack" means this
With his large belly & his never-empty bag, Hotei is one of the mythical gods of this--aptly, there are 7 of them
Part of the ransom paid to free this captured English king in 1194 was 50,000 sacks of wool
These public schools with limited enrollment are named for the special contract that governs them
According to its initials, you take the MCAT if you're pursuing a career in this
You can see why Arizona teachers demanding higher pay & more funds used the rhyming slogan this "For Ed"

A hot debate topic: 
Should teachers be granted this, giving them permanent status & protecting them from dismissal?

Steel yourself: 
This Pittsburgh university's Tepper School of Business has one of the top online MBA programs
"Perdida" by Gillian Flynn
"El Principito", originally a French fable
By E.M. Forster, "Una Habitación con Vistas"
"Cincuenta Sombras Liberadas", the third in a series
"Por Quién Doblan las Campanas", set in Spain
Bill Russell & this man AKA "The Stilt" didn't talk for 20 years at one point, but ended up fast friends
Shaq is good friends with this diminutive comedian & once picked him up & rocked him like a baby on Leno
Kevin Durant left OKC, yet his relationship with this Thunder super-guard is "all love at the end of the day"
Dennis Rodman once said of this world leader, "I don't condone what he does, but he's my friend"
Kareem Abdul-Jabbar wrote a book about this "50-year friendship" with this UCLA coach
Paul Wolfowitz quit this "World" financial institution in 2007 after a promotion for his girlfriend caused a ruckus
Like Davy Crockett, Sam Houston was a politician in this state, but resigned as gov. in 1829 & ended up in Texas
In a 1936 radio address this British king said, "I now quit altogether public affairs & I lay down my burden"
In 2000 President Fujimori of this South American country sent his resignation via fax from a Tokyo hotel
Pushing 80, this leader with a hyphenated name resigned as prime minister of Israel in 1963
Ask the Pope--you can see the Greek seer Laocoon & his sons grappling with sea serpents at this museum
Some 25,000 years old, the stone statuette Venus of Willendorf is fittingly from this period whose name means "old stone"
In Victorian England, a plaster one of these was added to a copy of Michelangelo's David
A major clue in "Angels & Demons" involves the Bernini statue "The Ecstasy of" this saint of Avila
The blue beastie seen here by Jeff Koons has this simple 2-word title
To translate a language between two speakers in real time
From the Latin for "seed plot", it's a conference or college course to learn about a narrow subject
A junior law enforcement officer answering to a sheriff
A square & an equilateral triangle are examples of regular these
In a classic Kurt Weill song, "The days grow short when you reach" this month on the calendar
It refers to legal services done for free
In 1862 Lincoln suspended this writ
A decision given per curiam is "by the whole" this
Vanished Nazi Martin Bormann was tried this way
Stare decisis means that this, a past decision in a given area of law, should be respected
"If you're lost, you can look and you will find" this No. 1 hit by Cyndi Lauper
I hope you're having this, the subtitle of Green Day's "Good Riddance"
It's the "Rocky Horror" tune about "a jump to the left" & "a step to the right"
In 2017 Jon Bellion hit the Top 20 with this downer
"If I could save" this, Jim Croce sang, "The first thing that I'd like to do is to save every day 'til eternity passes"

(Travis Stork presents the clue.) Athletes aren't the only ones who can get these injuries caused by the brain banging against the skull--If you experience continued headache, nausea, dizziness, forgetfulness or sensitivity to light & noise after a head impact, get to a doctor

(Travis Stork presents the clue.) Chronic bending of the spine to look at a phone can cause the painful syndrome known as "text" this; to help treat & prevent it, stand up with your back flat against a wall & perform the "snow angel" exercise

(Travis Stork presents the clue.) Heart disease causes 1 in 4 deaths in the U.S each year; to reduce your risk, get active, don't smoke & cut down on processed & prepackaged foods high in this element, symbol Na

(Travis Stork presents the clue.) To help prevent colds & flu get an annual flu shot, keep your distance from infected people & wash your hands before touching these moist membranes that line the eyelids, nose & mouth

(Travis Stork presents the clue.) Put away bright phones & computer screens & turn off the lights at bedtime for a good night's rest--darkness stimulates the pineal gland's production of this sleep-inducing hormone

final_jeopardy.clue: Both "Barnaby Rudge" & this other famous Dickens novel begin in 1775 & deal with mob violence
